Package org.ldaptive.referral

Class ModifyReferralHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.referral.AbstractReferralHandler<ModifyRequest,​Void>
      • org.ldaptive.referral.ModifyReferralHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<ModifyRequest,​Response<Void>>, ReferralHandler<ModifyRequest,​Void>
    public class ModifyReferralHandler
extends AbstractReferralHandler<ModifyRequest,​Void>
    Provides handling of an ldap referral for modify operations.
